response.summary:
Through my Experience abroad, I learnt how to work in an international environment, where I've improved my German and English simultaneously finding great interest and motivation for the development of new technologies. By working in the Automotive and Manufacture Industry, I had the opportunity to get in touch with current technical subjects and processes in order to achieve the proposed goals of the companies.

Recently, I'm focused in the Software and Hardware development towards the e-Mobility in the Automotive Sector.

Competencies: Matlab/Simulink, Advanced Control Techniques, System Dynamics Analysis, Sensors and Actuators, Machine Learning, artificial intelligence (AI), Computer Vision, Critical Thinking, Entrepreneurial Thinking.
response.skills: Matlab, Altium Designer, Autodesk Inventor, Java, Engineering, C++, Codewarrior, AutoCAD, Alemán, Inglés, Liderazgo, Gestión de Proyectos, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Robotics, DELMIA, LabVIEW, ETAS INCA, CANape, ArtemiS

profile_positions.title: Freelancer - Software Development

profile_positions.description:
Assignment of tasks:

▪ Setting, adapting and giving technical support on ERP-Software to integration of operational analysis and the Industry 4.0 in business processes as asset-management, maintenance-management and calibration-management.

▪ Develop and generate mechatronic conceptual designs to improve the factories’ operations.

▪ Generate, analyze and evaluate the improvement opportunities inside the manufacturing plants to increase the efficiency of the companies.

▪ Internal audit over planning, execution and completion of mechatronic projects.

▪	Inventory and internal audit over all the machinery and equipment of the industrial process over the whole group of companies.


The Grasco group consists of six different companies (Grasco Ltda, Detergentes Ltda, Gracetales Ltda, Indupalma Ltda, Oro Rojo Ltda und Alimentos Concentrados Raza Ltda).
profile_positions.title: Supervisor of Mechatronic Projects

profile_positions.description:
Bei dieser Entwicklungsabteilung der elektrischen Motoren für die Lenksysteme des PKWs wurde bei mir die folgende Aufgabenstellung:

▪  Mitarbeit im Motorlabor und an aktuellen Entwicklungsthemen in der Regelung von Asynchron- und Synchronmaschinen, sowie Einarbeitung in die vorhandene Messtechnik und Softwaretools.
▪ Selbständiges Durchführen von Standardmessungen mit Prototypen.
▪ Messungen und Auswertungen zur Evaluierung neuer Funktionen, anhand der erstellten Spektrogramme zur Verbesserung der Haptik.
▪ Optimierung der Prüfstands-Dokumentationen, sowie Einarbeitung neuer Mitarbeiter.
profile_positions.title: Praktikant in der Entwicklung von elektrischen Antrieben

company.name: Akka Technologies
company.description:
AKKA is a European leader in engineering consulting and R&D services. Our comprehensive portfolio of digital solutions combined with our expertise in engineering, uniquely positions us to support our clients by leveraging the power of connected data to accelerate innovation and drive the future of smart industry. AKKA accompanies leading industry players across a wide range of sectors throughout the life cycle of their products with cutting-edge digital technologies (AI, ADAS, IoT, Big Data, robotics, embedded computing, machine learning, etc.) to help them rethink their products and business processes. 

Founded in 1984, AKKA has a strong entrepreneurial culture and a wide global footprint. Our 20,000 employees around the world are all passionate about technology and share the AKKA values of respect, courage and ambition.
